# 可替代的团队领袖培养计划

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua
ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua
ke-tidai-de-tuandui-lingxiu-peiyang-jihua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
